message.content:
cs.HC, cs.GR, cs.CYBER, cs.CE, cs.AI 

The paper discusses the use of immersive virtual reality (IVR) serious games (SGs) for evacuation training and research, which involves human-computer interaction (HCI) and graphics (GR) for creating the gaming environment. The paper also discusses the use of behavioral and pedagogical impacts, which are related to cybersecurity (CYBER) and computer engineering (CE). Additionally, the paper mentions the use of artificial intelligence (AI) for creating more effective SGs. Therefore, the most likely sub-categories are cs.HC and cs.GR, followed by cs.CYBER, cs.CE, and cs.AI.
